dialogues.text: Mt. Azure is an ancient mountain. It was created thousands of years ago by Terra, the Spirit of Earth.
While Terra created the mountain, Seyla, the Spirit of Water, created a water source atop the mountain. That is the water you see here flowing into Lake Azure.
Many believe the source of this water to have divine properties. I have been instructed by Elder Selwyn to protect the mountain from trespassers.
I'm sorry, but you cannot enter without Elder Selwyn's approval.
With Elder Selwyn's permission, you may enter. Please be careful inside Mt. Azure.
